Returns: A @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ object containing the metrics for this application. The keys for this HealthStats object will be from the @B_android#os#health#UidHealthStats_E@ class.
takeMyUidSnapshot().Description: Return a @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ object containing a snapshot of system health metrics for the application calling this API. This method is the same as calling takeUidSnapshot(Process.myUid()).

Returns: A @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ object containing the metrics for the requested application. The keys for this HealthStats object will be from the @B_android#os#health#UidHealthStats_E@ class.
Parameters: int: User ID for a given application.
takeUidSnapshot(int).Description: Return a @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ object containing a snapshot of system health metrics for the given uid (user-id, which in usually corresponds to application).

Returns: An array of @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ objects containing the metrics for each of the requested uids. The keys for this HealthStats object will be from the @B_android#os#health#UidHealthStats_E@ class.
Parameters: int: An array of User IDs to retrieve.
takeUidSnapshots(int[]).Description: Return a @B_android#os#health#HealthStats_E@ object containing a snapshot of system health metrics for the given uids (user-id, which in usually corresponds to application).

ClassDesc: Provides access to data about how various system resources are used by applications.
